ipccraft.ipcconfig.title: IPCCraft Settings
ipccraft.ipcconfig.useClock.tooltip: Use the Clock icon instead of your Minecraft Head and display the world time.
ipccraft.ipcconfig.sendConfigSettingsMes: The message that gets sent in a multiplayer world.
ipccraft.ipcconfig.promoteIPCCraft.toolt: Adds 2 buttons to promote this mod. (thanks btw)
ipccraft.ipcconfig.useCustom: Enable Custom Presence (TO MODIFY GO TO .minecraft/config/ipccraft/(MC VERSION).config)
ipccraft.ipcconfig.useCustom.tooltip: Make it so that your Custom, Client ID and so on
